roleset.name: avoid for political reasons, avoid, in protest
roleset.note: BOYCOTT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'boycott' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 52. (from boycott.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boycott-v: passive
example.text: [The vote in Ankara]-2 was boycotted *trace*-2 by opposition politicians, who vowed to oust Ozal.
example.arg: by opposition politicians, who vowed to oust Ozal

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Past experience has shown that the KMT and DPP can work together to boycott Executive Yuan proposals ; if they do this to a Soong - led executive branch , this could lead to a crisis ending in either a vote of no confidence or dissolution of the parliament .

example.name: boycott-n
example.text: Defense lawyers for two jailed Khmer Rouge leaders continued their boycott of proceedings Monday at a U.N.-backed tribunal in Phnom Penh.
